TB_FP_CORPORATION.description: Define the first step information to construct the company structure

TB_FP_SITE.description: Define the two-level information for constructing the company structure

TB_FP_PLANT.description: Define the three-step information for constructing the company structure

TB_FP_STAGE.description: Define the four steps information for constructing the company structure

TB_FP_CALENDAR_MST.description: Defines the calendar to be applied to the resource

TB_FP_ROUTE.description: Define the information of the route

TB_FP_RESOURCE.description: Defines the basic information of a resource that describes facilities, manpower, etc

TB_FP_PRODTN_LIMIT.description: Maximum yield defines the maximum yield information per group

TB_FP_ITEM.description: It defines standard information for all items such as raw materials (subsidiary materials), semi-finished products (intermediate goods), and finished products

TB_FP_RESRC_VIRTL_CNT.description: Define resource capacity by time period

TB_FP_RESRC_SELECT_RULE.description: Defines the criteria for selecting a job from a resource

TB_FP_BATCH_RESRC.description: Defines batch information of Batch Resource

TB_FP_BATCH_RESRC_INV.description: It defines batch resources and batch production information for production products

TB_FP_TOOL_SUPPLY.description: Define the supply/discard quantity of the tool resource based on the initial quantity

TB_FP_BOR.description: Defines resource information available in the process

TB_FP_BOR_AVAIL_TIME.description: Defines the time available to start/end work in Route and Resource

TB_FP_BOR_CALENDAR.description: Defines the available/unavailable time of the resource in the route

TB_FP_BOR_SET_MST.description: Define a resource set information, including bor information

TB_FP_BOR_SET_DTL.description: Define resource set information in detail, including bor information

TB_FP_BOR_SET_TOOL.description: Defines the relationship between a bor set and a tool resource

TB_FP_BOR_TIME_CONSTRAINT.description: Defines the start time constraint of the bill of resources

TB_FP_PRODTN_SEQ_MAP.description: Define product production order rules by resource

TB_FP_BYPRODUCT.description: Defines the by-products generated in the route

TB_FP_BOM_ROUTING.description: Defines the correlation between item and route

TB_FP_ALT_MAT_GRP.description: Define raw material group information for alternative material types

TB_FP_STORAGE_INV_ASSIGN.description: Defines what can go into a repository and the priority repositories from which it is selected

TB_FP_STORAGE_MIXABLE_ITEM.description: Defines whether to store mixed items in a specific storage

TB_FP_BUNDLE.description: Defines bundle information for route synchronous production

TB_FP_BUNDLE_BOR_SET.description: The synchronized production of each bundle is defined in bor set units

TB_FP_JC_TIME_GRP.description: Defines job change times that occur when a resource's jobs change (route group)

TB_FP_JC_TIME.description: Defines job change times that occur when a resource's jobs change (route)

TB_FP_MOVABLE_ROUTE.description: Defines the information of movable routes

TB_FP_CONTAINER.description: Defines the process that will be used continuously by returning from the container usage startup process

TB_FP_ROUTE_TIME_CONSTS.description: Define the time constraint information of the route

TB_FP_TIME_WINDOW.description: Defines time constraint information between routes

TB_FP_BOD.description: Defines information for logistics movement planning

TB_FP_BOD_CALENDAR.description: Define a holiday schedule for bod

TB_FP_DELIVERY_PATTERN.description: Defines a shipping pattern for bod

TB_FP_DMND_ALT_RESRC_POLICY.description: Specify the criteria for selecting alternative resources for each demand

TB_FP_DMND_BATCH_GRP.description: Specify batch group by sales order

TB_FP_DMND_BOM_ROUTING.description: Defines the correlation between item and route by sales order

TB_FP_DMND_BOR.description: Defines resource information that can be used in the route for each sales order

TB_FP_DMND_BOR_EFFICIENCY.description: Specifies the bor efficiency per sales order

TB_FP_DMND_BOR_PRIORITY.description: Defines the priority of resources by time by sales order

TB_FP_DMND_INTER_BOR_TIME.description: Designate queue, setup, wait, and move times between bors for each sales order

TB_FP_DMND_INV_USAGE_RULE.description: Specify policies regarding product production and product inventory usage by sales order

TB_FP_DMND_ORDER_CONNECTION.description: Specify the connection information for inventory production orders and sales orders

TB_FP_DMND_PRODTN_RULE.description: Designate production policies such as alternative process and alternative resource selection for each sales order

TB_FP_DMND_RESRC_ASSIGN.description: Assign available/unavailable resources for each sales order

TB_FP_DMND_ROUTE_ASSIGN.description: Specifies which routes can or cannot be produced by sales order

TB_FP_DMND_ROUTE_GRP.description: Prioritize each route by sales order

TB_FP_DMND_ROUTE_PST.description: Specifies when a specific process can start for each sales order

TB_FP_DMND_STOCK_POLICY.description: Specify stock usage policy per sales order

TB_FP_DMND_TAT.description: Specifies manufacturing lead time by sales order

TB_FP_DMND_TERMINAL_INV.description: Specifies end-of-plan items by sales order

TB_FP_DMND_STOCK_ASSIGN.description: Assign stock to the sales order

TB_FP_WO_ALT_RESRC_POLICY.description: Specifies criteria for selecting a replacement resource for each work order

TB_FP_WO_BATCH_GRP.description: Specify a batch group for each work order

TB_FP_WO_BOM_ROUTING.description: Define the correlation between items and routes for each work order

TB_FP_WO_BOR.description: Defines resource information that can be used in the route for each work order

TB_FP_WO_BOR_EFFICIENCY.description: Specifies the bor efficiency per work order

TB_FP_WO_BOR_PRIORITY.description: Defines the priority of resources by time by work order

TB_FP_WO_INTER_BOR_TIME.description: Designate queue, setup, wait, and move times between bors for each work order

TB_FP_WO_INV_USAGE_RULE.description: Specify policies regarding product production and product inventory usage by work order

TB_FP_WO_ORDER_CONNECTION.description: Specifies inventory production order and work order connection information

TB_FP_WO_PRODTN_RULE.description: Designate production policies such as alternative process and alternative resource selection for each work order

TB_FP_WO_RESRC_ASSIGN.description: Assign available/unavailable resources for each work order

TB_FP_WO_ROUTE_ASSIGN.description: Specifies which routes can or cannot be produced by work order

TB_FP_WO_ROUTE_GRP.description: Prioritize each route by work order

TB_FP_WO_ROUTE_PST.description: Specifies when a specific process can start for each work order

TB_FP_WO_STOCK_ASSIGN.description: Specify connection information for work order and stock

TB_FP_WO_STOCK_POLICY.description: Specify stock usage policy per work order

TB_FP_WO_TAT.description: Specifies manufacturing lead time by work order

TB_FP_WO_TERMINAL_INV.description: Specifies end-of-plan items by work order

TB_FP_WIP_BATCH.description: Defines the deployment information of work in progress

TB_FP_WIP_INV.description: Define material usage information for work in progress

TB_FP_WIP_RELATION.description: Defines relationship information between work in progress

TB_FP_WIP_RESRC.description: Set up the resources your wip is working on

TB_FP_CFM_RESRC.description: Define a plan for the resources you are working with

TB_FP_CFM_STOCK_ASSIGN.description: Set the inventory information that will be used first in the confirmed plan

TB_FP_CODE_GRP.description: Define a dedicated common code group

TB_FP_PLAN_STEP_SEQ.description: Defines the sequence of planning steps

TB_FP_PLAN_POLICY_DTL.description: Define settings based on planning policy
